abstract.t: [draft-ietf-nvo3-framework-07] and [draft-ietf-nvo3-overlay-problem- statement-04] all have information on _Auto-provisioning/Service discovery_ or _Dynamic Provisioning_. Some further information should be helpful to clarify how automatic virtual network/service provisioning can be done in NVO3. This document describes the NVO3 general virtual network provisioning processes and discusses how VN can be automatically provided and related requirements.
